info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:49PM EDT until June 16 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON...SOUTHERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN BELMONT...OHIO AND BROOKE COUNTIES... At 1149 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Tiltonsville, or 8 miles northwest of Clearview, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Martins Ferry, Warwood, Wellsburg, West Liberty, Clearview, Tiltonsville, Yorkville, Hopedale, Smithfield, Adena, and Dillonvale. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
